title: A national robotics strategy is necessary to reshore manufacturing, says the Congressional Robotics Caucus
description:
The Congressional Robotics Caucus says a unified strategy is needed for U.S. economic and military competitiveness.

The post A national robotics strategy is necessary to reshore manufacturing, says the Congressional Robotics Caucus appeared first on The Robot Report.
